mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_list (log_list_no, project_list_no, user_no, content) values (null,#{projectListNo},#{userNo}, CONCAT(#{content} , '(','##', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%b %d %Y %h:%i %p') ,')' ) )
mapper.select: select content from log_list where project_list_no = #{projectListNo} and user_no =#{userNo};
